So... what you are telling us is that the game should be nothing but flash, teleport, zhonyas and smite?

I don't know why people are so negative; it's actually an interesting idea, as long as mages were given some sort of compensation.

The cost would be not everyone could come into the game with Flash + Ignite, which would significantly slow down snowballs. It'd also be soft-prohibited for top laners, since they specifically kind of need a Teleport option.

To those complaining about level 1 Stasis: Why do you care? if they blow it at level 1, they're likely to die to whoever was chasing. And they won't have it at level 6 when they actually need it, since it'd have a significant cooldown.

It'd also leave a slot open on Inspiration to put a better rune.

You'd actually have to pick your summoners based on teams, not a default.

(P.S. I don't care about GA taking AD's having it. If they want it, they have to either give up Flash or Ignite, which is fine by me)
